Ok, thought experiment; would you rather have 40 of these with 20 lands, or 40 [Spiritmonger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spiritmonger) and 20 lands?  
  
QED IE ETC BBC DDT Spiritmonger > Time Walk.   
  
The proof is right there ladies and gentlemen!  
  
(By the way I'm joking. But don't forget, this will NOT win you a game on its own.)

[Meh. There is another card that gives you an extra "turn"](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=276416) for ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol) and sorcery speed. It even costs like 5 cents... and this card... well...  
  
But seriously, obviously bonkers and I actually like the art too. The weird modern arty feel of some of the early magic cards  [is interesting in its own right.](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=1987) This card mostly combos with disposable income, or getting into Magic really early.
